summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4644 for the improvement of Highland Drive, from 4th Avenue North to 5th Avenue North; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 53997, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
